|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141'''9116'''20013J REV:08", "RoHS", and the new '''Linksys''' logo appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{WiFiCert|WFA62026|12/15/2015}} ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The serial port named "J14 connector" is at the left of the processorâ€™s heat diffuser. :The 3.3V pin is marked by a little white arrow in front of the most left pin. :Next is TX pin and next is RX pin and finally GND is the most right pin. 
VCC  TX RX  GND
 o   o   o   o
 ^
{{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
